metadata.title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's South Beach Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt in Custom Fit
features: Highlight your timeless style with this short sleeve shirt from Tommy Hilfiger .
Men's button down shirt with a button-down collar .
Tommy Hilfiger shirt for men with a button front closure .
Custom fit Shirt with a front pocket and embroidered logo flag .
This Short sleeve button-down shirt from Tommy Hilfiger will be perfect for any occasion
